attributes.action: Have David Ashford mentioned in Queens Honors list
attributes.additional_details: Please issue Mr. Ashford with OBE, MBE, or other sutable recognition.
attributes.background: David Ashford, Isle of Man MHK (Member for House of Keys) Douglas North, and Minister for Health; deserves recognition from Britain for all he's doing during the Covid 19 situation.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions calling for people to be given honours.

You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours
